Given its quality and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I am offering this exclusive item to you for $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique features and benefits that set it apart. I trust you'll find its value exceeds your expectations. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer
